article.title: Boeing Receives Contract for New Air Vehicle Technologies
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Boeing Company's engineering, operations and technology division is being awarded an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for $139 million. This action will enable the Air Vehicle Integration and Technology Research Program to conduct research to develop, demonstrate, integrate and transition new air vehicle technologies and prototypes that will provide affordable, revolutionary capabilities to the warfighter. The technology developments will provide for cost effective, survivable air vehicle platforms capable of accurate delivery of weapons and cargo worldwide. FRL/PKVC, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
